title: Analysis of Female Learners' Experiences in University Makerspaces and Development of Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Makerspaces and Foundational Knowledge of Gender Equality Education
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning activities. The objective is to derive educational strategies through analysis of female learners' makerspace experiences

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more gender-aware barriers experienced by female learners in makerspace environments.
Learners can systematically analyze learner experience data using phenomenological interview techniques.
Based on analysis results, learners can propose improvement plans for gender-equal learning environments in makerspaces.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
